name: createSchema
description: This call creates a new schema. Request body should contain a `schema` object which should atleast have these properties with `string` values: - **`type`**: Allowed types are `openapi3`, `openapi2`, `openapi1`, `raml` and `graphql`. - **`language`** : Allowed languages are `json` and `yaml` for OpenAPI and RAML schema types. GraphQL schema type accepts only `graphql` language. - **`schema`**: Optional. If passed, must be the content of the schema as a `string`. Response contains a `schema` object with all the details related to the created schema, namely, `id`, `language`, `type` etc. > Requires API Key as `X-Api-Key` request header or `apikey` URL query parameter.
